content.text:
# Draft:King Joseph I. Timiyan

His Royal Majesty Elder Capt. Joseph Ijawperebo Timiyan (JP) Ph.D (born 27th March not identified yet) who is the Torububou 1, Agbonu, the Ebenanaowei of Ogulagha Kingdom is the traditional ruler of Ogulagha Kingdom in Delta State, Nigeria. He is the 16th or 19th king of Ogulagha Kingdom depending on how the lineage is counted.
